activities: We process personal information from customers who are residents of the EU to provide products and services to our customers, to facilitate our business operations, and in connection with meeting our legal and regulatory compliance obligations.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Our Safe Harbor Privacy Notice covers all applicable customer data (offline, on-line, and manually-processed data).
recoursemech: We have designated the International Center for Dispute Resolution division of the American Arbitration Association as our independent recourse mechanism.
